question:
In indonesian april is.... season    a. wet 
b. dry 
c. winter 
d. spring 

mohon dijawab kak ‍♀​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

C winter kalo gk salah mohon maaf

B. Dry = kemarau

Penjelasan:
A. Wet = musim penghujan
B. Dry = musim kemarau
C. Winter = musim dingin/salju
D. Spring = musim semi
